en.title: Accessibility Fix
items: Fixed an issue with text alternative for shirt not working correctly.

en.title: Android application is available
items: Neule.art Android application has been published!
Link to Play Store is in the footer of the page.

en.title: Neule.art is now on Instagram
items: Neule.art has now an Instagram-account. You can find the link from footer of the site.

en.title: Fixed issues with several yarn stores
items: Fixed issues with several yarn stores not getting correct data.

en.title: Added K√§sity√∂liike Somikki
items: Added K√§sity√∂liike Somikki to the list of store where Lettlopi-color availability is checked from.

en.title: New stores added!
items: Added two stores to list of stores where Lettlopi-color availability is checked from: Lasim√§en Linnanrouva and PiipaShop

en.title: Neule.art back in business
items: The site is back in business!
I did some navigational changes to support future updates.

en.title: Add Paapo
items: Added Paapo to the list of store where Lettlopi-color availability is checked from.

en.title: RSS-feed for updates added
items: Added RSS feed for both Finnish and English updates. You can subscribe to them from the 'RSS'-link under the title 'Changelog'

en.title: Some colors got new color codes to resemble real colors better
items: Some colors (Ash, Light beige ja White) got new, closer-to-reality color codes.
Also, this change required some changes to code. Those are invisible to users.

en.title: Add multicolor Icelandic sweater and refactor site structure
items: Added "new" pattern - multicolor Icelandic sweater, so, every individual color can be now selected.
Also, refactored the site structure to support adding new patterns.

en.title: Remove contact form and add Lanka-Kaisa
items: Removed the contact form, as it was causing more problems compared to it's usefulness.
Fixed a bug with routing.
Added Lanka-Kaisa to the list of stores where the Lettlopi-color availability is checked from.

en.title: Show all yarn color amounts in one page
items: Added a link to the front page to display the amount of all colors in selected stores
Again, if you have a store in mind, which should be included, send me a message.

en.title: Show yarn color amounts in different stores
items: Added a link to the front page to display the amount of selected colors in selected shops
If you have a store in mind, which should be included, send me a message.

en.title: Sort colors alphabetically
items: Colors are now sorted alphabetically

en.title: Contact form and other improvements
items: A contact form has been added.
Added a link to generate random colors
Some smaller and nonvisible improvements, such as adding sitemap.

en.title: List of colors and other improvements
items: A list of colors has been added under the color picker. Now you don't have to guess the colors based on the yarn color names.
Also some misc improvements to styles etc.

en.title: The site is online üéâ
items: The site is online!
